channel.title: AFM on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AFM on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Can TIFF’s Content Market Compete With AFM and Cannes?
item.description: The new initiative, backed by $16 million in funding, will go beyond film to include television and gaming as well as XR and immersive content — but not everyone is convinced.
